siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.
blogPost.body: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.
blogPost.title: eqtble - Making it easy for companies to gain insights from HR data
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Eqtble通过回答为什么表现优异的员工会离开，为什么合格的候选人会拒绝聘用，来释放您的人力资源数据的价值。通过与150多个系统的连接，我们提供关于劳动力、人才招聘、参与和薪酬的见解。
localize.tagline: 让企业轻松从人力资源数据中获得洞察力。

localize.description: Eqtble通過回答爲什麼表現優異的員工會離開，爲什麼合格的候選人會拒絕聘用，來釋放您的人力資源數據的價值。通過與150多個系統的連接，我們提供關於勞動力、人才招聘、參與和薪酬的見解。
localize.tagline: 讓企業輕鬆從人力資源數據中獲得洞察力。

previous.excerpt: YouTube Shorts is a short-form video experience for anyone who wants to create short, catchy videos with nothing but their mobile phone. We’ve worked alongside music partners to make sure artists and creators have a library of songs to use in their Shorts.
previous.title: YouTube Shorts - Catchy videos using nothing but mobile phones

localize.description: YouTube Shorts是一个短视频体验，任何人都可以用手机创建短小精悍的视频。我们与音乐合作伙伴一起合作，确保艺术家和创作者有一个歌曲库，可以在他们的Shorts中使用。
localize.tagline: 吸引人的视频只用手机

localize.description: YouTube Shorts是一個短視頻體驗，任何人都可以用手機創建短小精悍的視頻。我們與音樂合作伙伴一起合作，確保藝術家和創作者有一個歌曲庫，可以在他們的Shorts中使用。
localize.tagline: 吸引人的視頻只用手機

next.excerpt: Pulls structured data from any website as easily as copy paste. Whether lists of people and companies from directories, search engines or any website, Clay already understands the web and automatically fills them in a spreadsheet for you. -Automated CRM-
next.title: Clay - The spreadsheet that fills itself

localize.description: 从任何网站上提取结构化数据，就像复制粘贴一样简单。无论是来自目录、搜索引擎还是任何网站的人员和公司名单，Clay都能理解网络，并为您自动将其填入电子表格。-自动CRM-
從任何網站上提取結構化數據，就像複製粘貼一樣簡單。無論是來自目錄、搜索引擎還是任何網站的人員和公司名單，Clay都能理解網絡，併爲您自動將其填入電子表格。-自動CRM-
